name: Justus Katila Ndaisi
about: I am a dedicated Customs Declaration & Logistics Specialist based in Kenya, with proven experience streamlining the complexities of international trade. I combine hands-on operational experience at ports with an academic foundation in Applied Statistics and Computing to optimise import workflows, ensure compliance, and manage risk. I specialise in Japanese vehicle sourcing and importation, end-to-end customs clearance using ICMS, and handling general cargo including agricultural products, electricals and textiles.
